headline: How The Latest Analyst Revisions Are Shaping Realty Income’s Valuation Story
summary: Realty Income’s latest narrative shift comes with a slightly higher fair value estimate of about $63.38 and a modestly lower discount rate of roughly 8.06%, pointing to a touch more confidence in the REIT’s long term cash flow resilience. These incremental adjustments mirror Wall Street’s balanced but constructive stance, where steady revenue growth expectations near 4.96% are weighed against a still cautious macro backdrop. Stay tuned to see how you can track these subtle yet important moves...
